about.title: Sonova
about.description: The most sophisticated and user-friendly video downloader on the internet. Supporting multiple platforms including YouTube, Twitter, Facebook, TikTok, and more.

features.title: Multi-Platform Support
features.description: Download from YouTube, Twitter, Instagram, TikTok, and many more platforms.
features.descriptionLong: Your all-in-one platform for video downloading. High-speed processing, multiple format support, and instant access to your favorite content, all in one place.

features.title: High Speed Downloads
features.description: Get your videos quickly with our high-speed download servers.
features.descriptionLong: Experience lightning-fast downloads with our optimized servers. Save time and enjoy your content without the wait, no matter where you are in the world.

features.title: No Registration
features.description: Start downloading immediately without any sign-up required.
features.descriptionLong: Experience seamless offline entertainment with our advanced download technology. No more buffering, no more interruptions - just pure, uninterrupted content enjoyment.

features.ctaDescription: Join millions of users who trust Sonova for their video downloading needs.

default.title: No Download Limit
default.description: Unlimited downloads anytime, anywhere. No restrictions, just pure freedom.

default.title: Always Free
default.description: Completely free forever. No subscriptions, no hidden costs, just pure value.

default.title: Lightning Fast
default.description: High-performance servers ensuring the fastest downloads in record time.

default.title: Simple & Intuitive
default.description: Just paste the URL, select format, and download. Elegant simplicity at its best.

home.title: Download YouTube Videos
home.description: Fast, secure, and free YouTube downloader. Save your favorite videos in MP4 or extract audio in MP3 format with just a few clicks.

notice.title: Important Notice
notice.description: We respect copyright laws and do not support downloading copyrighted material

faq.question: Is it free to use?
faq.answer: Yes, our service is completely free to use with no hidden charges.

faq.question: Do I need to install any software?
faq.answer: No, you can download videos directly from your browser without any installation.

instagram.title: Instagram Downloader
instagram.description: Download photos, videos, and reels from Instagram in high quality.
instagram.heroDescription: Download photos, videos, and reels from Instagram with ease. Save your favorite content to view offline.

features.photoDesc: Download high-quality photos from Instagram posts and stories.
features.videoDesc: Save Instagram videos and IGTV content in the best available quality.
features.reelsDesc: Download Instagram Reels to watch them offline anytime.
features.storiesDesc: Save Instagram stories before they disappear.
features.privateDesc: Download content from private accounts (with permission).

faq.q1: How do I download from Instagram?
faq.a1: Copy the Instagram post URL and paste it into our downloader. Click download and save the content.
faq.q2: Can I download private Instagram content?
faq.a2: You can only download content from private accounts if you have access to that account.
faq.q3: Is there a limit to how much I can download?
faq.a3: No, you can download as much content as you want without any limits.

tiktok.title: TikTok Downloader
tiktok.description: Download TikTok videos without watermark in HD quality.
tiktok.heroDescription: Download TikTok videos without watermark in the highest quality available. Save your favorite TikToks to watch offline.

features.noWatermarkDesc: Download clean TikTok videos without the annoying watermark.
features.hdQualityDesc: Get the highest quality videos directly from TikTok's servers.
features.fastDesc: Download videos in seconds with our high-speed servers.
features.availabilityDesc: Our service is always online, ready to process your downloads anytime.
features.mobileFriendlyDesc: Works perfectly on all mobile devices and tablets.
features.trendingDesc: Discover and download videos from trending hashtags.
features.noRegistrationDesc: Start downloading immediately without creating an account.

faq.q1: How do I download TikTok videos without watermark?
faq.a1: Simply paste the TikTok video URL and click download. We'll remove the watermark automatically.
faq.q2: Is it legal to download TikTok videos?
faq.a2: It's legal for personal use. Please respect copyright and only download content you have permission to use.
faq.q3: What video quality can I download?
faq.a3: You can download videos in the highest quality available, up to 1080p HD.
faq.a4: Our TikTok downloader works on all devices including smartphones, tablets, and computers.

youtube.title: YouTube Playlist Downloader
youtube.description: Download entire YouTube playlists in MP4 or MP3 format.
youtube.heroDescription: Download entire YouTube playlists with a single click. Save videos in MP4 or extract audio as MP3 files.

features.playlistDesc: Download entire playlists with all videos in one go.
features.formatDesc: Choose between MP4 video or MP3 audio format.
features.qualityDesc: Select from various quality options including HD and Full HD.
features.batchDesc: Download multiple videos at once to save time.
features.speedDesc: Fast downloads with our optimized servers.

faq.q1: How do I download a YouTube playlist?
faq.a1: Paste the playlist URL and click download. All videos will be queued for download.
faq.q2: Can I download private or unlisted playlists?
faq.a2: You can only download public playlists or private playlists that you have access to.
faq.q3: Is there a limit to playlist size?
faq.a3: No, you can download playlists of any size.

support.title: Farel Rasyah
support.bio: I'm a passionate software engineering student specializing in full-stack development for web and mobile platforms. I love crafting elegant solutions and building practical tools that enhance user experience and productivity.
support.footerText: Ready to build something amazing together? Let's connect!

footer.tagline: Fast, secure, and completely free video downloader. Download from YouTube, Facebook, TikTok, and more without any limitations.

youtube.title: YouTube Playlist Downloader
youtube.description: Download complete YouTube playlists in high quality. Save entire playlists as MP4 or MP3 with our fast and free downloader.
youtube.heroDescription: Download complete YouTube playlists with ease. Save entire music collections, tutorials, or any playlist in your preferred format and quality.

features.title: Entire Playlist Download
features.description: Download complete YouTube playlists with a single click, saving you time and effort.

features.title: Multiple Formats
features.description: Choose from various formats including MP4, MP3, and more to suit your needs.

features.title: High Quality
features.description: Download videos in up to 4K quality or extract high-quality audio.

features.title: Mobile Friendly
features.description: Access and download your playlists from any device, including smartphones and tablets.

features.title: Background Processing
features.description: Continue browsing while your playlists are being processed in the background.

features.title: Batch Download
features.description: Download multiple videos from a playlist simultaneously for faster results.

faq.question: How do I download a YouTube playlist?
faq.answer: Simply paste the YouTube playlist URL into our downloader, select your preferred format and quality, then click download.

faq.question: Can I download private or unlisted playlists?
faq.answer: No, our downloader only works with public YouTube playlists.

faq.question: What video qualities are available?
faq.answer: You can download videos in various qualities from 144p up to 4K, depending on the original video quality.

faq.question: Is there a limit to the playlist size?
faq.answer: You can download playlists of any size, but very large playlists may take longer to process.

mindreplay.title: MindReplay Downloader
mindreplay.description: Download your MindReplay sessions and memories.
mindreplay.heroDescription: Save your MindReplay sessions and memories to your device for offline viewing.

features.sessionsDesc: Download your meditation and focus sessions to listen offline.
features.memoriesDesc: Save your MindReplay memories to your device.
features.highQualityDesc: Download in the highest available audio quality.
features.organizedDesc: Keep your downloads organized by categories and dates.
features.noInternetDesc: Enjoy your content without an internet connection.

faq.q1: How do I download my MindReplay sessions?
faq.a1: Log in to your account, go to your library, and click the download button next to any session.
faq.q2: Can I download sessions for offline listening?
faq.a2: Yes, you can download any session to listen to without an internet connection.
faq.a3: Premium users can download an unlimited number of sessions.

common.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

twitter.title: Twitter Video Downloader
twitter.description: Download videos from Twitter in high quality with just one click.
twitter.heroDescription: Download videos, GIFs, and images from Twitter with ease. Save your favorite Twitter content to watch or share offline.

features.videoDesc: Download videos from Twitter in high quality with just one click.
features.imageDesc: Save images from tweets in their original quality.
features.fastDesc: Quickly download Twitter media without any complicated steps.
features.mobileDesc: Works perfectly on all devices, including smartphones and tablets.
features.trendingDesc: Discover and download media from trending Twitter hashtags.
features.noAccountDesc: Download Twitter content without needing to create an account or log in.

faq.q1: How do I download videos from Twitter?
faq.a1: Copy the URL of the tweet containing the video and paste it into our downloader. Click download and save the video to your device.
faq.q2: Can I download videos from private Twitter accounts?
faq.a2: No, you can only download videos from public Twitter accounts.
faq.a3: Our downloader supports MP4 format, which is compatible with most devices and media players.
faq.q4: Is there a limit to the video length I can download?
faq.a4: You can download videos of any length, but longer videos may take more time to process.
